item.title: By: margotheangel
item.dc:creator: margotheangel
item.description:
Thanks for sharing - I especially enjoyed hearing how supportive Mike was. You're very lucky to have each other - and now Daniel's lucky, too!

Personally, the photo that caught my eye the most was the picture of the wrinkly bottoms of his feet!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for sharing – I especially enjoyed hearing how supportive Mike was. You’re very lucky to have each other – and now Daniel’s lucky, too!

Personally, the photo that caught my eye the most was the picture of the wrinkly bottoms of his feet!

item.description:
Aww, this is beautiful and divine!
Thank you so much for sharing this precious moment!
item.content:encoded:
Aww, this is beautiful and divine!

item.title: By: Michelle Wiss
item.dc:creator: Michelle Wiss
item.description: Charlotte, what a fantastic story and Mike took such lovely photos -- I love the one of Daniel's feet! I had back labor too, but the epidural unfortunately didn't touch it at all. I can't believe you made it so far in the process before calling for the epidural. Aren't our bodies amazing?
item.content:encoded: Charlotte, what a fantastic story and Mike took such lovely photos — I love the one of Daniel’s feet! I had back labor too, but the epidural unfortunately didn’t touch it at all. I can’t believe you made it so far in the process before calling for the epidural. Aren’t our bodies amazing?

item.title: By: olisko
item.dc:creator: olisko
item.description: Thank you for sharing this story and the beautiful breath-taking pictures. Someone once said the moment a mother meets her child is holy. I couldn't agree more. The pictures really depict that.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for sharing this story and the beautiful breath-taking pictures. Someone once said the moment a mother meets her child is holy. I couldn’t agree more. The pictures really depict that.

item.title: By: Amy Webb
item.dc:creator: Amy Webb
item.description: Well said. I feared up just remembering my own deliveries and those first moments with the new one. I love delivery (ie epidurals). He's beautiful and so are you.
item.content:encoded: Well said. I feared up just remembering my own deliveries and those first moments with the new one. I love delivery (ie epidurals). He’s beautiful and so are you.

item.title: By: legal_beagle555
item.dc:creator: legal_beagle555
item.description:
Congrats again Char!!!

He's so adorable- and he definitely has his mommy's chin :-)

As I was reading this, I was thinking 1) how beautiful this new chapter in your life is and 2) how wonderful it has been to be able to follow you in livejournal, facebook etc for more than 10 years! Your outlook and posts are always so positive. I'm looking forward to seeing more photos of weddings in DC and your family.
item.content:encoded:
Congrats again Char!!!

He’s so adorable- and he definitely has his mommy’s chin

As I was reading this, I was thinking 1) how beautiful this new chapter in your life is and 2) how wonderful it has been to be able to follow you in livejournal, facebook etc for more than 10 years! Your outlook and posts are always so positive. I’m looking forward to seeing more photos of weddings in DC and your family.

item.title: By: rachaeldoss
item.dc:creator: rachaeldoss
item.description:
So glad you had a great experience.

I, too, found that watching my pushes in a mirror helped. I didn't want to look, but Ben said that my pushing got much better when I did. And honestly - even without having an epidural I can echo your sentiments of that pushing feeling being more about pressure than pain...after the double peak contractions I had with transition, the pushing felt almost like a good sneeze. LOL

He's beautiful. You did a great job. Congratulations again :-)
item.content:encoded:
So glad you had a great experience.

I, too, found that watching my pushes in a mirror helped. I didn’t want to look, but Ben said that my pushing got much better when I did. And honestly – even without having an epidural I can echo your sentiments of that pushing feeling being more about pressure than pain…after the double peak contractions I had with transition, the pushing felt almost like a good sneeze. LOL

He’s beautiful. You did a great job. Congratulations again

item.title: By: Stephanie Brauer
item.dc:creator: Stephanie Brauer
item.description: Oh Char! I loved reading the entire story in detail!! The photos are absolutely wonderful and capture the birth so beautifully. The one of you holding Daniel while crying makes my heart completely melt. That one photos says it all.... I can't tell you how happy I am for you and Mike. Love and hugs from Colorado :)
item.content:encoded: Oh Char! I loved reading the entire story in detail!! The photos are absolutely wonderful and capture the birth so beautifully. The one of you holding Daniel while crying makes my heart completely melt. That one photos says it all…. I can’t tell you how happy I am for you and Mike. Love and hugs from Colorado

item.title: By: Jessica @ Acting Adult
item.dc:creator: Jessica @ Acting Adult
item.description: Wow, what an amazing story. That's so wonderful to hear your excitement about the labor and finally meeting your lovely son. Those pictures are perfect.
item.content:encoded: Wow, what an amazing story. That’s so wonderful to hear your excitement about the labor and finally meeting your lovely son. Those pictures are perfect.

item.title: By: Kerryann

item.description: i loved reading this........so happy for you all
item.content:encoded: i loved reading this……..so happy for you all

item.title: By: heatherp8
item.dc:creator: heatherp8
item.description:
Oh, Charlotte - I'm so very happy for you!
Your lovely story and pix brought me to tears.
There's absolutely nothing on this earth as profound as the rush of love and elation a Mother experiences on seeing her child for the first time.
Thank you for sharing these precious moments!
Blessings to you all.
item.content:encoded:
Oh, Charlotte – I’m so very happy for you!
Your lovely story and pix brought me to tears.
There’s absolutely nothing on this earth as profound as the rush of love and elation a Mother experiences on seeing her child for the first time.
Thank you for sharing these precious moments!
Blessings to you all.
